thread.title: BRIEF-BNDES CEO Rabello says bank will not sell JBS stake, current prices too low

title: BRIEF-BNDES CEO Rabello says bank will not sell JBS stake, current prices too low
text: March 20, 2018 / 5:09 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-BNDES CEO Rabello says bank will not sell JBS stake, current prices too low Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Jbs Sa: * BRAZIL’S DEVELOPMENT BANK BNDES DECIDED ITS INVESTMENT ARM WON’T SELL PART OR FULL STAKE IN BRAZIL’S JBS- CEO * BNDES CEO RABELLO SAYS STAKE IN JBS HAS POTENTIAL TO BE VALUED AT MUCH HIGHER PRICES THAN CURRENT VALUATION * BNDES CEO RABELLO SAYS BANK CANNOT CONSIDER SELLING ITS STAKES IN JBS DUE TO FLAWS IN THE MEATPACKER’S CORPORATE GOVERNANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Tatiana Bautzer)
